property.name: text
property.value: This model launches a web server and provides a service available at http://localhost:8061/ErrorHandler. Run the model and navigate to that location (or double click on this comment).

property.name: text
property.value: This model shows how to build a modal web service. In this case, the service switches modes when an error occurs running in the normal mode. Note that it will switch modes for all users. There is no notion of sessions here.

property.name: message
property.value: You were told not to enter "error".
